# googler

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of googler is to ...

## Installation

You can install the released version of googler from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("googler")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
## load googler
library(googler)

## search google for "rstats" in past month
googler("rstats", time = "m1")

## search google news for rstats
googler("rstats", news = TRUE)
```
